metadata.title: CVE-2014-2914 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: fish (aka fish-shell) 2.0.0 before 2.1.1 does not restrict access to theconfiguration service (aka fish_config), which allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors, as demonstrated byset_prompt.

criterions.comment: fish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
